thread.title: Access to safe drinking water helps to sustain and prolong life

author: wn.com
title: Access to safe drinking water helps to sustain and prolong life
text: According to recent report, more than 1.8 billion people around the World drink contaminated water, thus arresting them with diseases such as Ebola, Diahorea, Cholera and other water borne diseases. World Hope International believes that access to safe drinking water helps to sustain and prolong life, prevent the spread of the diseases, and increase economy [â€¦]> ...
